level.heading: Corridors.
level.text: ยง 27-536 Corridors. Corridors shall comply with all of the requirements of subchapter six of this chapter, except as modified below: (a) Capacity. The capacity of corridors shall be as listed in table 8-1. (b) Changes in level. Changes in level requiring less than three risers in a corridor shall be by a ramp having a slope not greater than one in ten.
